titleStmt.title: The flovver of fidelity relating exactly the various adventures of three foraign princes, intermixed with variety of letters and pleasant sonnets / by John Reynolds ... author of that excellent historie entituled, God's revenge against murther.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, John, fl. 1621-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Mabb for George Badger, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
